name: Player
temple_description: The angel represents the player themselves. The main angel's growth will follow the teammates' growth. Players believe righteousness still exists in this chaotic world.

active_skills.name: Thunderstroke
active_skills.effect: Inflicts [Sunder Armor], reducing defense by 80% for 4 rounds. If the enemy is killed, deals additional 100% P.DMG to all enemies and inflicts them with [Sunder Armor].

active_skills.name: Battle Cry
active_skills.effect: Grants [Excite] state, increasing DMG and DEF by 60%, Crit by 40%, and restores HP equal to 90% of player's ATK for 3 rounds.

exclusive_ur_plus_skills.name: Divine Fury
exclusive_ur_plus_skills.effect: Every odd-numbered round, randomly attacks an enemy 3 times with True DMG equal to 100% of ATK and dispels one buff per hit.

exclusive_ur_plus_skills.name: Divine Aura
exclusive_ur_plus_skills.effect: At battle start, all allies recover HP equal to 100% of player's current HP. Excess healing (10%) is converted to a shield.

exclusive_ur_plus_skills.name: Divine Vessel
exclusive_ur_plus_skills.effect: At battle start, grants [Main character Halo] (undispellable), increasing all stats by 5% of the sum of allies' corresponding stats.
